job.title: Machine Learning Engineer - Marketing
job.description: pA leading tech company in Boston is looking for experienced Data Scientists to join their team As a lead Data Scientist here you will enhance customer experience and drive business You will work on customer facing data problems and develop Machine Learning models put into productionbrbrpp brbrppYou willbrbrppWork across teams to drive algorithmic decision makingbrbrppBuild and extend Machine Learning frameworks for scalable model training and deploymentbrbrppServe as a technical leader for members of your teambrbrpp brbrppAbout youbrbrpp5 years in industry as a Data Scientist Machine Learning Engineer or Software DeveloperbrbrppAdvanced degree in a quantitative fieldbrbrppStrong Python programmingbrbrppAbility to build and deploy advanced Machine Learning softwarebrbrppStrong communication skills  ability to communicate with business leadersbrbrppInterest in deploying machine learning models as a scalable servicebrbrpp brbrppIf this sounds like you please apply to learn more References will be collected upon contactbrbrppSthree US is acting as an Employment Agency in relation to this vacancybrbrbrpp brbrpbrbrpstrongEOE Statement strongSpecialist Staffing Group is an equal opportunity employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin disability or veteran statusbrbrpbrp brbrpbrpspanemstrongTo find out more about Huxley please visit wwwhuxleycombrbrstrongemspanp
